SENT.plain: Report on a thanatophoric dwarfism, which is a variety of achondroplasia
New born children with this failure are not able to survive the first few days after birth
This early death is due to a cardiorespiratory deficiency as a consequence of the extremely short ribs but also of the abnormal cartilaginous growth in the wall of bronchi and bronchioles
In this present case of the thanatophoric dwarfism the question is discussed in how far the disorder of the bronchial cartilage is the basis of the respiratory distress
